message: This is a fair offer considering the inflation factor. If you don't accept, the money will be worth less to me in the next round, but not to you.
I propose we split the money evenly. This way, we both get a fair share, and we don't have to worry about inflation affecting the value for either of us.
Considering I've lost 10% of the value in the first round and another 10% in this round, I need a larger share to compensate for the loss. This offer is still generous.
While I understand you're facing inflation, I also need to consider my own position. This offer is fair given the circumstances, and accepting it will prevent further losses from inflation.
